title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Mike Vrabel on A.J. Brown Trade, Tannehill & Willis , Belichick Influence,
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Mike Vrabel on A.J. Brown Trade, Tannehill & Willis , Belichick Influence,
description:
First, (3:00), Fake Questions, Real Answers, (3:00) including why more players aren’t speaking out in defense of Phil Mickelson, if Tom Brady is worth his massive broadcasting deal with Fox, if Nick Saban stepped over the in attacking Jimbo Fisher over NIL, if the USFL can survive, why today’s NBA is like the 70’s NBA, and how good USC can be with Jordan Addison.

Then, Titans Head Coach Mike Vrabel and Colin discuss Bill Belichick’s influence on (20:00), when he gained Belichick’s trust (24:00), how being a former player is an advantage as a coach (25:00), if the NFL has gotten too pro-offense (27:00), why he wasn’t concerned about Ryan Tannehill’s comments about  mentoring Malik Willis (29:00), what he likes about Willis (30:00), what made Tedy Bruschi so special (34:00), when Derrick Henry became truly dominant (36:00), why he wasn’t interested in college head coaching jobs (38:00), why it was so hard to lose AJ Brown (41:00), and if he has a secret sauce to beating Tom Brady (47:00).

Make sure you follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action! #herd

 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
